body_html:
@damienmg

I just have bazel-git built, and it seems only one single file is produced:
Build successful! Binary is here: ... /bazel/output/bazel

However, if I install bazel from the release https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases
I will get three files under /usr/local/lib/bazel/bin

jiapei@jiapei-GT72-6QE:/usr/local/lib/bazel/bin$ ls
bazel  bazel-complete.bash  bazel-real

So, I guess bazel-complete.bash and bazel-real don't matter at all ?? I can just copy the built-from-source .../output/bazel under /usr/local/lib/bazel/bin directly?
That's it???? That's all???

body:
@damienmg 

I just have bazel-git built, and it seems only one single file is produced:
`Build successful! Binary is here: ... /bazel/output/bazel`

However, if I install bazel from the release [https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases](url)
I will get three files under  /usr/local/lib/bazel/bin

```
jiapei@jiapei-GT72-6QE:/usr/local/lib/bazel/bin$ ls
bazel  bazel-complete.bash  bazel-real
```

So, I guess bazel-complete.bash and bazel-real don't matter at all ?? I can just copy the built-from-source .../output/bazel under /usr/local/lib/bazel/bin directly?
That's it???? That's all???
